actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Directing the Committee on House Administration to make public all transcripts of proceedings and documents related to the investigation of the House Administration Committee Task Force to Investigate the Operation and Management of the House Post Office.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Directs the Committee on House Administration to make public all transcripts of proceedings and documents related to the investigation of the House Administration Committee Task Force to Investigate the Operation and Management of the House Post Office leading to its final report.

titles.title: Directing the Committee on House Administration to make public all transcripts of proceedings and documents related to the investigation of the House Administration Committee Task Force to Investigate the Operation and Management of the House Post Office.
